description.@en: I have fought on the battlefield so long that the horrors I see no longer have an effect on me.

system.notes: Every Profession possesses a unique knack, an ability that no other Profession has access to. The Trait immediately follows the Profession’s description.

effect.@en: Whenever you are Moderately Wounded, temporarily add +1 to Damage Threshold. Whenever you are Seriously Wounded, temporarily add +2 to Damage Threshold instead. And finally, whenever you are Grievously Wounded, temporarily add +3 to Damage Threshold instead. These benefits do not stack and only count whenever you are in combat.
